trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 在視覺化設計工具提供設計階段支援<xref href="System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner class is a base class for deriving your own data source designer for a custom data source control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> class.
trans-unit.target: HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner 類別是基底類別衍生您自己的資料來源設計工具自訂資料來源控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>

trans-unit.source: Other classes that derive from HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner are <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: 其他類別衍生自 HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner 是<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceDesigner>。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the action list collection for the control designer.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項設計工具的行動清單集合。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> object that contains the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> items for the control designer.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref>物件，其中包含<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref>控制項設計工具項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.Configure*> method can be called.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.Configure*>可以呼叫方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.Configure*>

trans-unit.source: A design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], uses this property to determine whether to show a **Configure** command in the Smart-Tag menu in design view.
trans-unit.target: 設計裝載，例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]，使用這個屬性來決定是否顯示**設定**設計 檢視中的智慧標籤功能表命令。

trans-unit.source: This implementation always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個實作一律會傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*> method can be called.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>可以呼叫方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>

trans-unit.source: A design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], uses this property to determine whether to show a **Refresh Schema** command in the Smart-Tag menu in design view.
trans-unit.target: 設計裝載，例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]，使用這個屬性來決定是否顯示**重新整理結構描述**設計 檢視中的智慧標籤功能表命令。

trans-unit.source: This implementation always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個實作一律會傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Launches the configuration wizard for the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 啟動組態精靈，基礎資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The Configure method is not supported in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Configure 方法不支援<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner>

trans-unit.source: In all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情況下。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any property of the associated data source changes.
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的資料任何的來源屬性變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the HTML markup that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來代表控制項設計階段 HTML 標記。

trans-unit.source: The HTML markup used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 用來代表控制項設計階段 HTML 標記。

trans-unit.source: Gets the named data source view associated with the data source control.
trans-unit.target: 取得與資料來源控制項相關聯的具名的資料來源檢視。

trans-unit.source: The unique path to the block of data to use in creating the view.
trans-unit.target: 用來建立檢視的資料區塊的唯一路徑。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerHierarchicalDataSourceView"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerHierarchicalDataSourceView"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged"></xref> event when the properties of the data source have changed and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents*> property value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged"></xref>當資料來源的屬性已變更的事件和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents*>屬性值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents*>

trans-unit.source: The OnDataSourceChanged method notifies the designer of each control bound to the associated data source to refresh its control in the design host.
trans-unit.target: OnDataSourceChanged 方法，通知每個控制項繫結至相關聯的資料來源重新整理其設計主機中的控制項設計工具。

trans-unit.source: This method can be suppressed with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A> method, or by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method with an argument of `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可以隱藏與<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A>方法，或藉由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>方法的引數`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object provided by the calling object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>呼叫物件所提供的物件。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed"></xref> event when the schema of the data source has changed and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents*> property value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed"></xref>當資料來源的結構描述已變更時引發事件和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents*>屬性值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents*>

trans-unit.source: This method notifies the designers of each control bound to the associated data source that the fields in the schema have changed.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會通知繫結至結構描述中的欄位已變更的相關聯的資料來源的每個控制項的設計工具。

trans-unit.source: This method can be suppressed with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A> method, or by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method with an argument of `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可以隱藏與<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A>方法，或藉由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>方法的引數`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>物件。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the schema of the data.
trans-unit.target: 重新整理資料的結構描述。

trans-unit.source: This method is not supported in this class, but is implemented in derived classes, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不支援在此類別中，但實作在衍生類別中，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner>

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used in this implementation.
trans-unit.target: 在此實作中未使用此參數。

trans-unit.source: However, it should be supported in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 不過，它應該在衍生類別中支援。

trans-unit.source: In all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情況下。

trans-unit.source: Restores data source events after they have been suppressed.
trans-unit.target: 還原資料來源事件之後都已隱藏。

trans-unit.source: Data source events can be suppressed by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents%2A> property to `false`, or by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method with an argument of `true`.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源事件，可以藉由設定抑制<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents%2A>屬性`false`，或藉由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>方法的引數`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents*>屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the schema has been refreshed.
trans-unit.target: 重新整理結構描述後，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Postpones all data source events until after the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents*> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 延後所有資料來源事件，直到之後<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents*>方法呼叫。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents*>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether data source events have been disabled.
trans-unit.target: 指出是否已停用資料來源的事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged"></xref> or <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed"></xref> event has been disabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged"></xref>或<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed"></xref>事件已停用，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
